1.name: Solar Panel
1.description: A high-efficiency photovoltaic panel to generate electricity from sunlight

embodiment.description: High-efficiency solar cells with a tracking system

1.verification_plan: Testing under varying solar irradiance conditions

2.name: Water Intake
2.description: A high-flow mechanism to draw in raw water from the source

embodiment.description: A high-flow pump to draw water from the source

3.name: Filtration Unit
3.description: A high-performance set of filters to remove contaminants from the water

embodiment.description: A series of filters with decreasing pore size and UV treatment

4.name: Pump
4.description: A high-performance device to push water through the filtration unit

embodiment.principle: Centrifugal pump with variable speed drive
embodiment.description: A pump using a rotating impeller with a variable speed drive

5.name: Control Electronics
5.description: A advanced system to regulate the filtration process

embodiment.description: A small computer to monitor and control the system with wireless connectivity

5.verification_plan: Testing of system usability and user interface

6.name: Battery
6.description: A high-capacity device to store excess energy generated by the solar panel

embodiment.description: A deep cycle battery with high capacity

6.verification_plan: Testing of system performance during periods of low sunlight or at night

7.name: Water Outlet
7.description: A mechanism to dispense the filtered water

embodiment.principle: Tap or valve with flow meter
embodiment.description: A simple valve to control water flow with a flow meter
